mapper.delete: delete from course_selection where student_id = (select id from student where user_id = #{userId}) and course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.select: select cs.sign_score as sign_score, cs.work_score as work_score, cs.exp_score as exp_score, cs.exam_grade as exam_grade, cs.course_id as course_id, course.college as college, course.name as name, course.grade as grade, course.cno as cno, teacher.tno as tno, `user`.username as tname from course_selection cs inner join course on course.id = cs.course_id inner join teacher on teacher.id = course.teacher_id inner join `user` on teacher.user_id = `user`.id where student_id = #{id}
